credit_line: Museum purchase, Inaugural gift of the Class of 1961 Public Art Fund on the occasion of their 50th Reunion, dedicated in the belief that public art enhances the beauty of the Williams campus, accentuates learning, and stimulates creativity
title: Double L Excentric Gyratory II
description: Located at the southwest corner of the 62 Center lawn, between Bryant House and the 62 Center
inscriptions: Signed and dated on the base: G. Rickey 1981
